TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract DAVAdapterObject implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.InfoPath.SemiTrust.DAVAdapter

Docs.summary: Represents a connection to submit form information to a Microsoft Windows SharePoint Services server, or other servers that support DAV connections.

remarks.para: This type is a wrapper for a coclass that is required by managed code for COM interoperability. Use this type to access the members of the COM interface implemented by this coclass. For information about the COM interface, including a link to descriptions of its members, see.
Use the Item property of the to return a DAVAdapter object.

example.para: In the following example, the method of the DAVAdapterObject object is invoked in the event if the destination is reachable, otherwise a message box is displayed:
